Folio

POACC

Pakistan Orthopaedic and Cosmetology Centre's official website.

LinkRuby on Rails Javascript

Things I have built

Over the years I have worked on numerous web and mobile applications. Some of them are listed below:

Web Apps

Appointmentor

Appointmentor is an Online Appointment Booking system.

Tag-a-Bag

Tag a bag is an awesome service for lost and found and bags. I worked on the mobile version of the app. Built with backbone.js, jQuery Mobile and Ruby.

Couponific

Couponific allows you to send and receive coupons.

Patient Connections

Patient connections allows dental clinics to get feedback from their patients after they are done with their appointments.

Mobile Apps

London Smile

An app built for a dental clinic called london smile.

Moonlight Dental

Another dental app I created for Moonlight Dental Clinics

Sociofluence

Social Influence monitoring app

Enhance Dental

An app for yet another dental client called ehancde dental

First Triple
